p: Monovalent double oil emulsion vaccines containing A22 IRQ or A MAY 97 antigen were formulated as emergency vaccines (>6PD 50/dose) by Merial Animal Health (now Boehringer Ingelheim), United Kingdom. Cattle were vaccinated by administering 2 mL of vaccine, intramuscularly, in the side of the neck, according to the manufacturerâ€™s recommendations.
